slide.description: Jugtown Vinyl is an online store that offers unique vinyl applique artwork directly to consumers. The site was designed to offer larger photographic images of the products.
slide.title: Storefront

slide.description: When viewing a product, users can click through a gallery showcasing the product in each available color. Choices are made simple and visual by picking the color block and size.
slide.title: Product Page

slide.description: The buying experience is made easy by incorporating an intuitive cart and checkout system.
slide.title: Shopping Cart

slide.description: Built with the Shopp plugin for WordPress, the customer experience has been highly customized while also giving a simple management and reporting tool for the backend user.
